function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Rapid development of data resource without comprehensive planning","category":"Operational and implementation risks ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Proactive agile development of the covid-19 dashboard without proper planning may result in incomplete or inaccurate data risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on digital tools and remote work may lead to decreased attention to health and safety protocols on site, increasing the risk of disease ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Efficacy of technology against specific viruses, such as coronavirus","category":"Healthcare infrastructure and technology adoption risks
